Uses of Class
xxl.core.util.BitSet

  • Packages that use BitSet 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.io
    Provides some containers that are able to store their blocks on disk.
    xxl.core.cursors.differences
    The package xxl.core.cursors.differences provides miscellaneous implementations of the difference operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.joins
    The package xxl.core.cursors.joins provides miscellaneous implementations of the join operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
    xxl.core.spatial
    Support data types and building-blocks for spatial, temporal and mining algorithms (e.g. similarity joins)
    xxl.core.util
    This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.

      Fields in xxl.core.cursors.differences declared as BitSet 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BitSet NestedLoopsDifference.removedElements
      A bit set storing which elements of cursor input2 have been removed from cursor input1 already.

    • Uses of BitSet in xxl.core.cursors.joins

      Fields in xxl.core.cursors.joins declared as BitSet 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BitSet NestedLoopsJoin.bitVector
      A bit set storing for every element in the "inner" loop (the iteration input1) a single bit.

      Methods in xxl.core.util that return BitSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BitSet BitSet.convert(BitSet bitSet)
      The given SDK's BitSet is converted to a BitSet using a default precision of 64 bits.
      Methods in xxl.core.util with parameters of type BitSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BitSet.and(BitSet bitSet)
      Performs a logical AND of this target bit set with the argument bit set.
      int BitSet.compare(BitSet b)
      Compares the calling Bitset with the given BitSet b.
      int BitSet.compare(BitSet b, int nobits)
      Compares the calling Bitset with the given BitSet b in the specified number of bits nobits.
      int BitSet.compare(BitSet b, int nobits, int dim, int maxDim)
      Compares two BitSets with regard to only one dimension dim.
      int BitSet.compare2(BitSet b, int noLongs)
      Compares the calling Bitset with the given BitSet b in terms of their components, i.e. the longs will be compared directly.
      int BitSet.compareTo(BitSet bs)
      Compares the calling Bitset with the given Object o casted to a BitSet.
      int BitSet.diff(BitSet b)
      Compares two BitSets and returns the index of the first bit that differs starting at bit index 0.
      int BitSet.diff(BitSet b, int nobits)
      Compares two BitSets concerning the specified number of bits nobits and returns the index of the first bit that differs starting at bit index 0.
      void BitSet.or(BitSet bitSet)
      Performs a logical OR of this bit set with the specified bit set.
      void BitSet.xor(BitSet bitSet)
      Performs a logical XOR of this bit set with the bit set argument.
      Constructors in xxl.core.util with parameters of type BitSet 
      Constructor and Description
      BitSet(BitSet b)
      Creates a new BitSet.
